name: Bigger_Ore_Stacks_Forked
title: Bigger Ore Stacks (Forked)
author: nihilistzsche
description: Sets the stack size of ores and plates in the base game to a configurable value (250 default). Original Creator Mod by detourious. Updated by PablitusElMakina. Forked and changed to a setting by nihilistzsche.
